class_notes: (This course examines the development of sociological theory and conveys its diverse insights by analyzing the ideas of major theorists, placing those ideas in context, testing them against recent evidence, and applying them to contemporary issues.)
course_description: Prerequisite: one sociology course or consent of instructor. Analysis of development of sociological theory as tradition of inquiry into organization and change of groups and societies. Covers classical and major contemporary contributions.
prerequisites: Any SOC or SOC_OX  or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3948, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: F. Lechner, Status: Open
